content: I have just found a good use for this contributed module which has been ported but does not yet have a release. @jenlampton I would be happy to be a co-maintainer in order to get it released if that would help? @Laryn has also expressed interest in using it.
@Graham Oliver Can you please make an issue in the queue requesting to become a co-maintainer?

https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/views_field_view/issues/new

Build software better, together
GitHub is where people build software. More than 50 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 100 million projects.
If you'd like, you can also add a PR that adds your name to the readme :)
I have added an issue for this.
